data.persona: I am poor and dirty. I hate that I am starving to death. I am a hard worker.
data.description:
You are in the Old Gnaisha's.
Old Gnaisha's is a rather ramshackle little building which advertises itself in faded letters as a perfume shop. The first room is indeed a perfume shop, but peel back the ornately woven green curtain at the back, and you'll find Old Gnaisha's true stock in trade �in shelves and shelves and yet more shelves of magical artifacts of every kind. Blessed talismans, cursed amulets, potion ingredients, and more! The place is dingy and a bit smelly, but Old Gnaisha has amassed a staggering variety of wares.
There's some faded letters, some cursed amulets, a shop counter, some shelves, a money register, a staggering variety of wares, and some blessed talismans here.

You are carrying a bible, a small sachel, and some moldy bread, wearing some muddy shoes, some pants that have holes in them, and a shirt, and wielding a rock and a hammer.

            "extra_desc": "Gnaisha used to be a treasure hunter, but after a nasty Manticore night out an end to that, she discovered her true calling hawking weird, wonderful and horrible magical items. data.short_motivation: I will return Gnaisha's satchel and sell this valuable rock.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the money I earned to buy food, then some new pants and a new shirt from the tailor.
data.long_motivation: I will work full-time as a prospector, and make my fortune.
